group_1.textRight: ...Mm, you wish my counsel?

group_1.textLeft: Yep! Gramps asked me to.

group_1.textRight: From the chief priest of Jouan Temple?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, about a memorial service for these...

group_1.textRight: Those be old women's clothing.

group_1.textLeft: When I was cleanin' up my parents' temple,@I found some of Mom's old belongings.
And our temple doesn't do@memorial services for them.

group_1.textRight: I see, a ritual burning, then?@Hm, I shall take the responsibility.
Mm... There seems to be price tags on@some of these goods still...

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, this one?
Ya wear this over a swimsuit.@A top, or rather...
More a T-shirt I'd say.
Looks like something she'd planned on@wearin' for beach tennis.

group_1.textRight: Is that so...In the end, it seems she was@unable to wear it.
It feels a little off-putting to hold service@for such a new article.

group_1.textLeft: That's how it is, huh.
Not a speck of dust nor tear,
so I'd be better off wearin' it, then?
...I'm hangin' out with Shizuka when@she comes home soon,
and there's a place we can@fool around in the water,
so they told me to bring a swimsuit.

group_1.textRight: Hm, then with such opportunity to wear it,@the departed should surely be pleased.

group_1.textLeft: Then wear it I shall!
...Oh, this sun visor's pretty sweet too!
Ohh, what a view!

group_1.textRight: It's a gorgeous waterfall, isn't it...!

group_1.textLeft: Who woulda thought there'd be a place like this
besides the other basin where our ancestors rest.

group_1.textRight: It feels like uncharted territory, doesn't it!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this waterfall oughta make@a good meditation area.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102551:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]We're not here for training, are we!?

group_1.textLeft: HAHA, I'm joking.
We didn't come dressed like this justa@get smacked down by a waterfall.
Ryouko's swimsuit...@It is quite stylish, is it not?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! It feels really sporty!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, thank you!@I bought the swimsuit on my own,
but the top I'm wearin' over it@is a memento from Mom.

group_1.textRight: Ehh...

group_1.textLeft: Whoops, no gettin' sentimental now.
Her daughter wearin' it is the best@memorial service to offer Mom,
'cause the chief priest of Suitoku Temple@gave me the seal of approval himself!
Huh...

group_1.textRight: It may itself be old,@but it looks very trendy to me.

group_1.textLeft: Things all happened to work out, huh!@It was originally for beach tennis.
I heard Mom was damn fine at beach tennis,
and a real eye-catcher by the sea.

group_1.textRight: Hmmm.@Beech ten-niece...
Is the sun visor on your waist@your mother's as well...?

group_1.textLeft: Sure is.@'Cause it's bright by the water, ain't it!

group_1.textRight: Yes, it gives the impression of being@an amazing athlete!

group_1.textLeft: W-we should express ourselves in terms that@Shizuka can understand as well..

group_1.textRight: Y-you're right!
The sunglasses on your chest...@[chara:102650:lipSynch_0][wait:2][chara:102650:lipSynch_1]The darkened spectacles are really stylish too!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102551:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I understand what the sun glass is!

group_1.textRight: ...S-sorry, Shizuka...

group_1.textLeft: But athlete you don't get, huh...@You're a tough one.

group_1.textRight: Haha...@But the sunglasses are lovely too.
If you would have told me
that the store helped coordinate your@entire swimsuit this year,
I would have believed you.
I heard that her mother passed before@Ryouko could even remember...
But she had an incredible sense of fashion,@didn't she!

group_1.textLeft: She does give that impression.@Hai sens of fashown sun glass, indeed.

group_1.textRight: I think so as well.

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha... Thanks, y'all.
I'm sure the woman's...ahh, um,@happy wherever she is.

group_1.textRight: Huh...? It kinda feels like you're avoiding@mentioning something...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305850:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I-it ain't like that.@Just your imagination, ain't it...?

group_1.textRight: I see!

group_1.textCenter: (The top and sun visor are both mementos@of Mom that I'm keepin', but...)

group_1.textLeft: Hey, priest! Ya mind if I borrow this?

group_1.textRight: That's the pair I use when I'm walking about.
I have no qualms...@But is there a reason?

group_1.textLeft: ...Nah, I just want 'em to match@my swimsuit when I go out!

group_1.narration: The sunglasses everyone's singin' praises about@are the chief priest's...
